local_intent: Lower gently until contact with the grape after verifying visibility, alignment, and grasp pose; then confirm contact.
assumptions: Grasp pose 'grasp_grape' was computed earlier and remains valid
Gripper is open and positioned approximately above the target
coherence_with_global: Matches the global sequence around the grasp phase: verify target visibility and alignment, ensure grasp pose key exists, execute LowerUntilContact with speed=slow, force_threshold=10, timeout_ms=1200, then verify contact.
